panels.description: Lloc on es troba situat el Centre i si es situa damunt el punt es poden observar els sensors que conté.

targets.rawSql: SELECT * FROM iotib2.centros where Name = "Center 1"

panels.title: CENTER 1

targets.rawSql: select  milesight_payload.BatteryLevel from data join milesight_payload ON data.ID = milesight_payload.ID where milesight_payload.Tipo_dec = '01' order by trx_time desc limit 1;

select temperature from milesight_payload join data on data.id = milesight_payload.id where (tipo_dec='01' or tipo_dec='03') and data.dev_eui ="24-e1-24-12-8b-10-96-30" order by trx_time desc limit 1;

select humidity from milesight_payload join data on data.id = milesight_payload.id where (tipo_dec='01' or tipo_dec='03') and (light != 0 and TVOC != 0 and Co2 != 0 and presure != 0) and data.dev_eui ="24-e1-24-12-8b-10-96-30" order by trx_time desc limit 1;

select presure from milesight_payload join data on data.id = milesight_payload.id where (tipo_dec='01' or tipo_dec='03') and (light != 0 and TVOC != 0 and Co2 != 0 and humidity != 0) and data.dev_eui ="24-e1-24-12-8b-10-96-30" order by trx_time desc limit 1;

panels.description: Compostos Orgànics Volàtils Totals. Una categoria de compostos químics que poden evaporar-se fàcilment a temperatura ambient. Alguns, en concentracions elevades, poden ser perjudicials. Concretament més de 4000 ppb

targets.rawSql: select TVOC from milesight_payload join data on data.id = milesight_payload.id where (tipo_dec='01' or tipo_dec='03') and (light != 0 and humidity != 0 and Co2 != 0 and presure != 0) and data.dev_eui ="24-e1-24-12-8b-10-96-30" order by trx_time desc limit 1;

select light from milesight_payload join data on data.id = milesight_payload.id where (tipo_dec='01' or tipo_dec='03') and (humidity != 0 and TVOC != 0 and Co2 != 0 and presure != 0) and data.dev_eui ="24-e1-24-12-8b-10-96-30" order by trx_time desc limit 1;

select Co2 from milesight_payload join data on data.id = milesight_payload.id where (tipo_dec='01' or tipo_dec='03') and (light != 0 and TVOC != 0 and humidity != 0 and presure != 0) and data.dev_eui ="24-e1-24-12-8b-10-96-30" order by trx_time desc limit 1;
SELECT humidity FROM iotib2.sensecap_payload join data on data.id = sensecap_payload.id order by trx_time desc limit 1
SELECT temperature FROM iotib2.sensecap_payload join data on data.id = sensecap_payload.id order by trx_time desc limit 1
select  milesight_payload.BatteryLevel from data join milesight_payload ON data.ID = milesight_payload.ID where milesight_payload.Tipo_dec = '01' order by trx_time desc limit 1;

panels.description: Si el sensor detecta amoviment ens indicarà que hi ha presència , si deixà de detectarlo ens indicarà que no n'hi ha.

targets.rawSql: select  milesight_payload.ValorPresencia,HayPresencia from data join milesight_payload ON data.ID = milesight_payload.ID where (Tipo_dec = '01' or Tipo_dec = '03') and devEui = "24-e1-24-12-8b-10-96-30" order by trx_time desc limit 1 ;

panels.title: Motion_Sensor

panels.description: Alerta en el cas de que s'obri la porta i llavors mostra el seu estat.

targets.rawSql: SELECT ocStatus,ocNumber FROM iotib2.dragino_payload join data on data.id = dragino_payload.id  order by trx_time desc limit 1

panels.title: Actual_Open_Door_Detection

targets.rawSql: select  milesight_payload.BatteryLevel from data join milesight_payload ON data.ID = milesight_payload.ID where milesight_payload.Tipo_dec = '01' and dev_eui="24-e1-24-12-8b-10-96-30" order by trx_time desc limit 1;
SELECT batteryLevel FROM iotib2.sensecap_payload join data on data.id = sensecap_payload.id WHERE uplinkInterval != 0 order by trx_time desc limit 1
select  milesight_payload.BatteryLevel from data join milesight_payload ON data.ID = milesight_payload.ID where milesight_payload.Tipo_dec = '01' order by trx_time desc limit 1;
select  Battery from data join dragino_payload ON data.ID = dragino_payload.ID where Model IS NOT NULL  order by trx_time desc limit 1;

panels.description: Indica l'instant i el temps en què la porta s'ha quedat oberta, si ha estat oberta més de 5 minuts (es visualitzen les 10 últimes vegades).

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    trx_time,
    lastOpen
FROM (
    SELECT
        trx_time,
        lastOpen,
        LAG(lastOpen) over (ORDER BY trx_time asc) AS previous_lastOpen
    FROM
        iotib2.dragino_payload
    JOIN
        data ON data.id = dragino_payload.id
        WHERE lastOpen > 5
    ORDER BY
        trx_time desc
) AS subquery
WHERE
    lastOpen != previous_lastOpen OR previous_lastOpen IS NULL LIMIT 10;

panels.title: Open_Door_Time

targets.rawSql: select  milesight_payload.BatteryLevel from data join milesight_payload ON data.ID = milesight_payload.ID where milesight_payload.Tipo_dec = '01' order by trx_time desc limit 1;

panels.description: Calcul de paquets perduts, del medidor d'ambient interior, de cada mes, limitant-se als 6 darrers mesos.

targets.rawSql: SELECT porcentajePaquetesPerdidos,periodo FROM iotib2.paquetesperdidos where dev_eui = "24-e1-24-12-8b-10-96-30" limit 6

panels.title: Indoor_Ambiance_Sensor

targets.rawSql: select trx_time, humidity from data join milesight_payload on data.id = milesight_payload.id  where (tipo_dec='01' or tipo_dec='03') and data.dev_eui ="24-e1-24-12-8b-10-96-30"
SELECT trx_time,humidity FROM iotib2.sensecap_payload join data on data.id = sensecap_payload.id

panels.description: Calcul de paquets perduts, del medidor de temperatura i humitat exterior, de cada mes, limitant-se als 6 darrers mesos.

targets.rawSql: SELECT porcentajePaquetesPerdidos,periodo FROM iotib2.paquetesperdidos where dev_eui = "2c-f7-f1-c0-53-20-01-27" limit 6

panels.title: Outdoor_Temperature_Humidity_Sensor

targets.rawSql: select trx_time, temperature from data join milesight_payload on data.id = milesight_payload.id  where (tipo_dec='01' or tipo_dec='03') and data.dev_eui ="24-e1-24-12-8b-10-96-30"
SELECT trx_time,temperature FROM iotib2.sensecap_payload join data on data.id = sensecap_payload.id

panels.description: Calcul de paquets perduts, del detector de portes obertes, de cada mes, limitant-se als 6 darrers mesos.

targets.rawSql: SELECT porcentajePaquetesPerdidos,periodo FROM iotib2.paquetesperdidos where dev_eui = "a8-40-41-f0-61-87-16-d5" order by periodo desc limit 6

panels.title: Door_Open_Sensor

panels.description: Compostos Orgànics Volàtils Totals. Una categoria de compostos químics que poden evaporar-se fàcilment a temperatura ambient. Alguns, en concentracions elevades, poden ser perjudicials.

targets.rawSql: select trx_time, TVOC from data join milesight_payload ON data.ID = milesight_payload.ID where (tipo_dec='01' or tipo_dec='03') and data.dev_eui ="24-e1-24-12-8b-10-96-30"

panels.title: Indoor_TVOC

panels.description: Detecta presencia al detectar movimiento y como más cerca del dispositivo esté mayor será el valor que propocione el sensor   y viceversa

targets.rawSql: SELECT Presence, trx_time FROM iotib2.milesight_payload join data on data.id = milesight_payload.id where (tipo_dec='01' or tipo_dec='03') and data.dev_eui ="24-e1-24-12-8b-10-96-30"

panels.title: Indoor_Presence

targets.rawSql: select  milesight_payload.BatteryLevel from data join milesight_payload ON data.ID = milesight_payload.ID where milesight_payload.Tipo_dec = '01' order by trx_time desc limit 1;

panels.description: Descriu el percentatge de les diferents taxes de transmissió dels uplinks de tots els  medidors que hi ha al centre.

targets.rawSql: SELECT data_rate,count(data_rate) from data where (dev_eui = "2c-f7-f1-c0-53-20-01-27" or dev_eui = "24-e1-24-12-8b-10-96-30" or dev_eui="a8-40-41-f0-61-87-16-d5") and direction = "up" and port != '0' GROUP BY data_rate

panels.title: Data_Rate

panels.description: El màxim poden ser 60000, però no ha passat els 150000

targets.rawSql: select trx_time, light from data join milesight_payload ON data.ID = milesight_payload.ID where (tipo_dec='01' or tipo_dec='03') and data.dev_eui ="24-e1-24-12-8b-10-96-30"

panels.title: Indoor_Luminosity

targets.rawSql: select trx_time, presure from data join milesight_payload ON data.ID = milesight_payload.ID where (tipo_dec='01' or tipo_dec='03') and data.dev_eui ="24-e1-24-12-8b-10-96-30"

panels.description: Relació senyal-soroll de les senyals transmeses pels uplinks dels dispositius del centre.

targets.rawSql: SELECT trx_time,SNR FROM data where (dev_eui = "2c-f7-f1-c0-53-20-01-27" or dev_eui = "24-e1-24-12-8b-10-96-30" or dev_eui="a8-40-41-f0-61-87-16-d5") and direction ="up" and  port != '0'

panels.title: SNR

targets.rawSql: select trx_time, CO2 from data join milesight_payload ON data.ID = milesight_payload.ID where (tipo_dec='01' or tipo_dec='03') and data.dev_eui ="24-e1-24-12-8b-10-96-30"

panels.description: Porcertantge de vegades que s'ha obert i tancat la porta.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT ocStatus, COUNT(ocStatus) 
FROM iotib2.dragino_payload 
WHERE ocStatus IS NOT NULL 
GROUP BY ocStatus;

panels.title: Open_Close_Door_%

panels.description: Potència del senyal rebut de les senyals transmeses dels upliks dels dispositius del centre.

targets.rawSql: SELECT trx_time,RSSI_UP FROM data where (dev_eui = "2c-f7-f1-c0-53-20-01-27" or dev_eui = "24-e1-24-12-8b-10-96-30" or dev_eui="a8-40-41-f0-61-87-16-d5") and direction ="up" and  port != '0'

panels.title: RSSI
